name: 2017 VR
description: “2017” is an excellent VR Co-op Survival game, in which players from all over the world gather together in teams to try and hold back the zombie hordes and prevent the outbreak from spreading any further. You won't miss it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 6 GB available space
